ED_DecisionText:
At its 62nd plenary meeting, on 4 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee,  recalling its resolution 71/67 of 5 December 2016, decided to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-third session, under the item entitled “General and complete disarmament”, the sub-item entitled “Nuclear disarmament verification”.


(See A/72/409, para. 85, draft decision II, A/72/PV.62)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
